maqras.text: haneul-i sansanhi gallajigo
junimkke sunjonghamyeo uimuleul dahadoda
daejiga pyeonpyeonhage pyeolchyeojigo
geuan-ui modeun geos-i naedeonjyeojieo teongbige doemae
junimkke sunjonghamyeo uimuleul daha doda
ingandeul-iyeo sillo neohuiga junim eul hyanghae nolyeoghanani neohuineun geubun eul mannal geos-ila
geuui gilog-i oleun son-e issneun janeun
geuui gilog-i pyeon-anhi gyesandoeni
gippeohamyeo geuui gajog-eulo dol-aganola
geuleona geuui gilog-i dwie issneun janeun
jug-eum-eul hyanghayeo solichil geos-i ni
geuneun taoleuneun buljiog-eulo deul-eoganila
sillo geuneun geuui mulideulgwa jeul geohi banghwang haess-eul ppun
hananim-egelo gwiuihalila saeng gagji ani haessnola
geuleohji anhnola sillo junimkke seoneun ingan-eul jikyeobogo gyesinila
haejil ttaeui hwanghon-eul dugo maeng sehasa
bamgwa moyeodeun modeun geos-eul du go maengsehamyeo
wanjeonhi chaoleun dal-eul dugo maeng sehanani
sillo neohuineun han sanghwang-eseo daleun sanghwang-eulo olmgyeo ganila
geuleom-edo geudeul-i midji ani halyeo han geos-eun museun il-inyo
kkulan-i geudeul-ege nangsongdoena buboghayeo gyeongbaehaji anihamyeo
ohilyeo geugeos-eul geojis-ila bul sinhadeola
geuleona hananim-eun geudeul-ui sim jung-e gamchugo issneun modeun geos-eul asi nani
geudeul-ege gotongseuleoun beol-i iss-eul geos-ilaneun geos-eul gyeong-gohala
geuleona mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haengha neun uiloun jadeul-egeneun danjeoldoeji anhneun yeong-wonhan bosang-i iss-eul geos-ila
byeoldeul-ui gwedoleul dun haneul-eul dugo maengsehasa
yagsogdoen simpan-ui nal-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
jeung-eonhaneun jadeulgwa jeung-eonbadneun geudeul-eul dugo maengsehamyeo
hamjeong-eul mandeun geudeul-ege jeoju ga iss-eulila
geudeul-eun hwayeom-eul geugos-e deonjyeossnola
geudeul-eun geu hwayeom yeop-e anj-a
geudeul-i midneun sindodeul-ege jeojileul modeun geos-eul jeung-eonhanola
geudeul-eun geudeul-i gwonneung-gwa chanmi lo chungmanhasin hananim-eul midneundaneun iyulo geudeul-eul hagdaehayeossnola
haneulgwa daejiui wang-gug-i hananim kke iss-eumyeo geubun-eun modeun geos-eul jikyeo bogo gyesinila
sillo mid-eum-eul gajin namseong-gwa yeoseong-eul hagdaehago hoegaehaji anihan jadeul-egeneun jiog-ui eungbeol-i iss-eul geos-ini geudeul-eun taoleuneun buljiog-ui eungbeol-eul masbolila
geuleona mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haengha neun uiloun jadeul-egeneun gangmul-i heu leuneun cheongug-i issnani sillo geugeos-i widaehan sunglila
sillo geudae junim-ui eungbeol-eun eomhanila
geubunkkeseo changsihasyeossgie dasisaengmyeong-eul jusil su issnola
geubun-eun gwan-yong-gwa salang-eulo chung manhasa
yeong-gwang-ui gwonjwa-e anj-a gyesimyeo
tteushasineun modeun geos-eul haenghasi nila
gundaeui iyagiga geudaeege ileuleossneunyo
palaowa samudeu gundaeui iyagila
geuleondedo bulsinjadeul-eun geu jinlileul geoyeoghago issnani
hananim-eun geudeul dwieseo geudeul eul powihasinila
sillo igeos-i yeong-gwang-ui kkulan-eu lo
bohodoen gos-e bogwandoen geos-ila
haneulgwa saesbyeol-eul dugo maengsehasa
saesbyeol-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudae ege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
geugeos-eun bichnaneun byeol-ila
modeun ingan-egeneun geuleul gamsiha neun jaga issnani
geuga mueos-eulobuteo changjodoeeoss neunji saeng-gagke hala
tteol-eojineun han bang-ul-ui jeong-aeg-eulo changjodoemyeo
geu jeong-aeg-eun deungppyeowa neuggol sai eseo naoneun geos-ila
ileohdeus hananim-eun geu ingan-eul buhwalke hasil su iss-eusimyeo
sumgyeojin modeun geosdeul-i myeongbaegha ge deuleonaneun geunal
ingan-eun amuleon himdo geuligoguwonjado eobsnola
bileul bonaeneun haneul-eul dugo maengsehasa
sigmul-eul ssagteuge haneun daejileuldugo maengsehanani
sillo igeos-eun seon-ag-eul gubyeolhaneun malsseum-eulo
nongdam-eul wihan geos-i anila
eummohaneun geudeul-ege
naega bangchaeg-eul sewi dueoss-euni
jamsi bulsinjadeul-eul geudaelo dula eolmahue geudeul-eul beolhalila
